code: import decode from"jwt-decode";class AuthService{getProfile(){return decode(this.getToken());}loggedIn(){const token=this.getToken();return!!token&&!this.isTokenExpired(token);}isTokenExpired(token){try{const decoded=decode(token);if(decoded.exp<Date.now()/1000){return true;}else return false;}catch(err){return false;}}getToken(){return localStorage.getItem("id_token");}login(idToken){localStorage.setItem("id_token",idToken);window.location.assign("/");}logout(){localStorage.removeItem("id_token");window.location.assign("/");}}export default new AuthService();
